original_title: Scorpions - To Russia With Love and Other Savage Amusements
overview: This video release follows the Scorpions' 1989 Russian tour, with videos from Savage Amusement and Love at First Sting as highlights.  01. Blackout  02. Rhythm of Love  03. Holiday  04. Believe in Love  05. The Zoo  06. Walking on the Edge  07. Long Tall Sally  08. Don't Stop at the Top  09. Rock You Like a Hurricane  10. Media Overkill  11. Passion Rules the Game  12. We Let it Rock, You Let it Roll
tagline: An electrifying mix of their greatest tracks together with live footage from their 1988 Russian tour.
title: Scorpions - To Russia With Love and Other Savage Amusements
